column5: US construction spending was unchanged in April on a sharp jump in public construction outlays while spending on private residential projects fell for the fourth straight monthData for March was revised to show construction spending rising 01 instead of declining 09 as previously reported vs est rising 04 in April Construction spending was down 12 yy in AprilIn April spending on public construction projects rose 48 after increasing 05 in March It was the 4th consecutive monthly rise Federal construction spending soared 74 biggest jump in 112 yearsPrivate construction outlays fell 17 to the lowest level since January 2017 after being unchanged in MarchXLF ITB XHB RTH XRT
